body.p: The 1989 Framework identified predictive value and confirmatory value as components of relevance, and Concepts StatementÂ 2 referred to predictive value and feedback value. The Board concluded that confirmatory value and feedback value were intended to have the same meaning. The Board and the FASB agreed that both boards would use the same term (confirmatory value) to avoid giving the impression that the two frameworks were intended to be different.
